name: War Heroes – Nations
description:
Get into the Elvenian continent, choose a country and be prepare for
the battle. Battle every country and fightuntil you get to have victory upon every 
single one of them.
Get your troops ready, buy items and prepare for adventure!
Features:
-You can get soldiers, equipment and ordenance for the battle.
-Manage food resources and try to prevent your country from being on crisis.
-When you get to certain level of resources production, other countries will
 try to make deals and buy your merchandise.
-Prepare shipments and sell them or buy what you need on Gannes's international 
market place.
-Make deals to get resources that you need.
-Accomplish 5 emblems when you do great achivements.
And more...
